entry.tran: 试金石;验证手段;检验标准
entry.def: If you use one thing as a touchstone of another, you use it as a test or standard by which you judge the second thing.

example.ex: Job security has become the touchstone of a good job for many employees.
example.tran: 工作稳定性已成为很多员工衡量一份工作好坏的标准。

means.word_mean: 1. a basis for comparison; a reference point against which other things can be evaluated;

sentences.sentence: "they set the measure for all subsequent work"
